accountItem.regularWarning: Removing this address doesn't delete your recovery phrase or any private keys. Instead it just hides it from the extension and you won't be able to use it until you add it back.
accountItem.loudWarningTitle: Removing this address will remove its associated account from the UI.
accountItem.loudWarningBody: Are you sure you want to proceed?
accountItem.removeConfirm: Yes, I want to remove it

setPassword.title: Set unlock signing password
setPassword.subtitleFirstLine: You will be asked to enter this

passwordStrength.hintDesc: For a strong password, consider a mix of lower and uppercase characters, symbols, and numbers. Passwords should be over 8 characters.

settings.setAsDefault: Use Tally Ho as your default wallet
settings.joinDesc: Join our Discord to give us feedback!

exportLogs.title: Bug report
exportLogs.discordDesc: Visit us on our Discord channel, and report your bug there. Make sure to include the logs.
exportLogs.logDesc: To better understand your bug, we need you to export your logs.

analyticsSetUp.title: Analytics
analyticsSetUp.toggleDesc: Analytics help us understand your needs and empowers us to build a better wallet for you!

analyticsOffSlideUpMenu.title: Turn Analytics off?
analyticsOffSlideUpMenu.desc: Are you sure you want to turn analytics off? They help us a lot in building a better wallet for you
analyticsOffSlideUpMenu.snackbar: Analytics are off, turn back at any time

deleteSlideUpMenu.title: Delete your data?
deleteSlideUpMenu.desc: Are you sure you want to delete your data? They help us a lot in building a better wallet for you
deleteSlideUpMenu.snackbar: Private data will be removed soon

error.noSellAsset: Attempting to approve transfer without a sell asset.
error.noApprovalTarget: Attempting to approve transfer without an approval target.
error.nonContractAsset: Attempting to approve transfer of a non-contract asset.

wallet.sendToContractWarning: This is a contract address, sending assets could result in loss of funds.
